St. Petersburg airport resumes operations after drone shot down in nearby regionPulkovo airport in Saint Petersburg has resumed operations as Russian Defence Ministry said a Ukrainian drone was shot down in the neighbouring Leningrad region on Sunday. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 15:56:24 GMT BMS7774MTNNIPG4HMVMAWAC5MU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/st-petersburg-airport-resumes-operations-after-drone-shot-down-nearby-region-2024-03-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Egypt in touch with Hamas and Israel in search of Gaza ceasefire deal, sources sayEgypt was in contact with senior Hamas and Israeli figures as well as other mediators on Sunday in an effort to restart negotiations for a truce in the Gaza Strip during the Muslim holy month of Ramadan, which begins on Monday or Tuesday, two Egyptian security sources said. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 15:28:28 GMT PGYG2EGVC5OFFOWDUCE6CNDUOM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/egypt-touch-with-hamas-israel-search-gaza-ceasefire-deal-sources-say-2024-03-10/Reuters世界中东
Gaza aid ship waiting to sail from Cyprus as charity builds jetty, source saysA ship carrying tonnes of food for Gaza remained docked in a Cyprus port on Sunday as preparations were underway to launch a yet untested maritime aid route to the enclave, where the United Nations estimates a quarter of the population [USN:L2N3FJ212 TEXT:"faces starvation"]. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 15:19:46 GMT NDPTTCX2PJKPRHL3LWFQQU5VUI https://www.reuters.com/world/gaza-aid-ship-waiting-sail-cyprus-charity-builds-jetty-source-says-2024-03-10/Yiannis Kourtoglou, Stamos Prousalis世界
US, Jordan airdrop more aid to Gaza, US military saysThe United States and Jordan carried out a new airdrop of humanitarian aid to Gaza's Palestinians on Sunday, parachuting in more than 11,500 meals, the U.S. military said. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 14:12:45 GMT OYXCRRZA7BLWLL7EQOM3DXMJJA https://www.reuters.com/world/us-jordan-airdrop-more-aid-gaza-us-military-says-2024-03-10/Reuters世界
Sudan army general rules out Ramadan truce unless RSF leaves civilian sitesThere would be no truce in Sudan in the Islamic holy month of Ramadan unless the Rapid Support Forces (RSF) paramilitary group leaves the homes and sites of civilians, senior Sudanese armed forces General Yasser al-Atta said on Sunday. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 13:21:12 GMT PELZRDKMCNLWZIRSKU3C2YDTEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/sudan-army-general-rules-out-ramadan-truce-unless-rsf-leaves-civilian-sites-2024-03-10/Reuters世界非洲
Central African bloc lifts Gabon sanctionsThe Economic Community of Central African States agreed to lift sanctions on Gabon on Saturday and reintegrate it into the regional bloc, six months after suspending its membership in response to a coup that ousted President Ali Bongo. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 12:36:16 GMT UM4Y7RDGFRIJLJSLQ5YVTQX3TU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/central-african-bloc-lifts-gabon-sanctions-2024-03-10/Reuters世界非洲
US military airlifts embassy personnel from Haiti, bolsters securityThe U.S. military said on Sunday it has carried out an operation in Haiti to airlift non-essential embassy personnel from the country and added U.S. forces bolster embassy security, as Caribbean nation reels under a state of emergency. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 12:13:32 GMT CO27EBV7TZO5XF7MMZ6ANY7SKU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-military-airlifts-embassy-personnel-haiti-bolsters-security-2024-03-10/Reuters世界
Israel's Herzog pleads for peace at Amsterdam Holocaust museum amid protestIsraeli President Isaac Herzog, attending an opening of a Holocaust museum in Amsterdam on Sunday, called for prayers for peace and the immediate release of hostages taken by Hamas in its Oct. 7 attack and still held by the Islamist militants. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 12:12:33 GMT 7A45YTD2YNNIZAR5IDY5HSZEM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/israels-herzog-opens-holocaust-museum-amsterdam-amid-protest-2024-03-10/ Charlotte Van Campenhout, Piroschka Van De Wouw, Hilde Verweij世界
Senegal opposition coalition promises new currency and revamp of oil contractsA Senegalese opposition coalition backed by popular firebrand Ousmane Sonko launched its presidential campaign platform on Saturday with promises to create a new national currency and renegotiate mining and energy contracts. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 11:54:44 GMT 3HMHDBCLXBOC5DPQMRDKEIX6QU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/senegal-opposition-coalition-promises-new-currency-revamp-oil-contracts-2024-03-10/Reuters世界非洲
Swiss police search for six missing skiers near MatterhornPolice in Switzerland's Valais canton on Sunday were searching for six people who went missing during a ski tour that departed from the Alpine town of Zermatt. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 11:48:05 GMT T2OW7OSGKZMF5CRBPP2MPK3H7A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swiss-police-search-six-missing-skiers-near-matterhorn-2024-03-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Palestinians prepare for Ramadan in the shadow of Gaza warHopes for a ceasefire, which would have allowed Ramadan to pass peacefully and enabled the return of at least some of the 134 Israeli hostages held in Gaza, appear to have been disappointed, with talks in Cairo apparently stalled. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 11:30:48 GMT R2BNHETO4JJOPBDV2FN5KBNUJI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinians-prepare-ramadan-shadow-gaza-war-2024-03-10/Sinan Abu Mayzer. Nidal Al-Mughrabi. Bassam Masoud世界中东
